author: Darrell Etherington
title: Amazon launches Amazon Care, a virtual and in-person healthcare offering for employees
description: Amazon has gone live with Amazon Care, a new pilot healthcare service offering that is initially available to its employees in and around the Seattle area. The Amazon Care offering includes both virtual and in-person care, with telemedicine via app, chat and …
content: Amazon Care offers both virtual and in-person healthcare services for Amazon employees.

author: James Vincent
title: Microsoft unveils Surface Duo, a foldable Android phone
description: Microsoft surprised everyone with a dual-screen Android device.
content: The Surface Duo marks Microsoft’s return to the smartphone market, running Android OS.

author: Sarah Smith
title: Climate change: UN summit sets new global targets
description: World leaders gathered to discuss urgent climate action.
content: The UN climate summit resulted in new pledges to reduce carbon emissions worldwide.

author: Tom Wilson
title: Bitcoin surges past $10,000 as investors seek safe havens
description: Cryptocurrency markets rally amid global economic uncertainty.
content: Bitcoin’s price climbed above $10,000 as investors looked for alternatives to traditional assets.

author: Emily Dreyfuss
title: AI beats humans at reading comprehension
description: A new AI system has surpassed human performance on a major reading test.
content: Researchers say the breakthrough could lead to smarter search engines and digital assistants.

author: Samuel Axon
title: Apple announces new MacBook Pro with M1 chip
description: Apple’s new MacBook Pro features the first Apple-designed processor for Macs.
content: The M1 chip brings significant performance and battery life improvements to the MacBook Pro.

author: Laura Smith
title: NASA's Perseverance rover lands safely on Mars
description: NASA’s rover begins its mission to search for signs of ancient life on Mars.
content: Perseverance will collect rock samples and search for evidence of past microbial life.

author: John Reed
title: Global markets rally as economic outlook improves
description: Stock markets around the world rose sharply on positive economic news.
content: Investors are optimistic as economic indicators point to a strong recovery.
